Text: Weekly UpdatePST Graduate Brothers Once again Pig Dinner will be held April If you have an address change or know someone that does email me or Ryan Czir Today we elected Brett Foltz graduate relations chair This is a newly created position in the house because the job used to fall under the pig chair So if you have anything that you would like to see done please contact Brett at or x I am doing some revision of the graduate list serve If you know of anyone that wants to be added or subtracted please contact me Thanks Nick Seglie Corresponding

Phi Gam Weekly UpdatePST Returnpath From Fullname Socrskibum MessageID Date Mon Jan EST Subject Phi Gam Weekly Update To MIMEVersion ContentType multipartalternative boundarypartabdeboundary XMailer AOL for Windows US sub Graduate Brothers Our new cabinet is in place and now functioning with some degree of competency If you need to get a hold of us for any reason the contact numbers are President Kurt Niebuhr x Treasurer Chris Jackson x Recording Joey Buckley x Corresponding Nick Seglie x Over break the cabinet traveled to Internationals in Lexington for a cabinet retreat and represented well for Chi Deutron Our newly elected scholarship chair Jon Schlatter just received the first annual Tim Donatell scholarship The scholarship was organized by a group of Tims pledge brothers to honor him and help out an undergrad brother This semester we will not be pledging a spring class because there is no room left in the house but we still need over twenty great guys for next fall So if you know anyone who might be good for the house call or email the rush chair Jason Ingram x Other than that we are preparing for the upcoming semester and focusing on integrating this large pledge class into the house Perge Nick Seglie Corresponding Secretary
PIG DINNERPST PIG DINNER is April You should be getting a letter in the mail this week from our new pig chair Ryan Czir You can get a hold of him at or x
